SELECT a.BBS_ID, e.BBS_NM, a.TRGET_ID, a.REGIST_SE_CODE, b.CODE_NM as REGIST_SE_CODE_NM, a.USE_AT, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, c.CMMNTY_ID, c.CMMNTY_NM, d.CLB_ID, d.CLB_NM, e.BBS_TY_CODE FROM COMTNBBSUSE a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNBBSMASTER e ON a.BBS_ID = e.BBS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE b ON b.CODE = a.REGIST_SE_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNCMMNTY c ON a.TRGET_ID = c.CMMNTY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNCLUB d ON a.TRGET_ID = d.CLB_ID WHERE b.CODE_ID = 'COM001' AND a.REGIST_SE_CODE != 'REGC07'
e.BBS_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchWrd#,'%')
ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

e.BBS_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchWrd#,'%')

UPDATE COMTNBBSUSE SET USE_AT = 'N', LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE() WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.BBS_ID, b.BBS_NM, a.TRGET_ID, d.USER_NM, a.REGIST_SE_CODE, c.CODE_NM as REGIST_SE_CODE_NM, a.USE_AT, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM COMTNBBSUSE a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNBBSMASTER b ON a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON c.CODE = a.REGIST_SE_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER d ON a.TRGET_ID = d.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.BBS_ID IN ( SELECT BBS_ID FROM COMTNBBSUSE WHERE TRGET_ID = #trgetId# AND USE_AT ='Y' ) AND a.REGIST_SE_CODE = 'REGC07' UNION ALL SELECT a.BBS_ID, b.BBS_NM, a.TRGET_ID, '[전체]' USER_NM, a.REGIST_SE_CODE, c.CODE_NM as REGIST_SE_CODE_NM, a.USE_AT, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM COMTNBBSUSE a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNBBSMASTER b ON a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON c.CODE = a.REGIST_SE_CODE WHERE a.BBS_ID IN ( SELECT BBS_ID FROM COMTNBBSUSE WHERE TRGET_ID = #trgetId# ) AND a.REGIST_SE_CODE in ('REGC05', 'REGC06') UNION ALL SELECT a.BBS_ID, b.BBS_NM, case WHEN e.EMPLYR_ID is null THEN f.EMPLYR_ID ELSE e.EMPLYR_ID END as TRGET_ID, case WHEN g.USER_NM is null THEN h.USER_NM ELSE g.USER_NM END as USER_NM, 'REGC07' as REGIST_SE_CODE, '게시판사용자등록' as REGIST_SE_CODE_NM, '' as USE_AT, '' as FRST_REGISTER_ID, '' as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM COMTNBBSUSE a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNBBSMASTER b ON a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON c.CODE = a.REGIST_SE_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER g ON e.EMPLYR_ID = g.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER h ON f.EMPLYR_ID = h.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.BBS_ID IN ( SELECT BBS_ID FROM COMTNBBSUSE WHERE TRGET_ID = #trgetId# AND USE_AT ='Y' ) AND a.REGIST_SE_CODE in ('REGC05', 'REGC06') AND ( (a.BBS_ID, e.EMPLYR_ID) not in (SELECT BBS_ID, TRGET_ID FROM COMTNBBSUSE) OR (a.BBS_ID, f.EMPLYR_ID) not in (SELECT BBS_ID, TRGET_ID FROM COMTNBBSUSE) ) ) tt
tt.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchWrd#,'%')
ORDER BY tt.USER_NM DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(tt.BBS_ID) FROM ( SELECT a.BBS_ID, d.USER_NM FROM COMTNBBSUSE a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNBBSMASTER b ON a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON c.CODE = a.REGIST_SE_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER d ON a.TRGET_ID = d.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.BBS_ID IN ( SELECT BBS_ID FROM COMTNBBSUSE WHERE TRGET_ID = #trgetId# AND USE_AT ='Y' ) AND a.REGIST_SE_CODE = 'REGC07' UNION ALL SELECT a.BBS_ID, '[전체]' USER_NM FROM COMTNBBSUSE a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNBBSMASTER b ON a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON c.CODE = a.REGIST_SE_CODE WHERE a.BBS_ID IN ( SELECT BBS_ID FROM COMTNBBSUSE WHERE TRGET_ID = #trgetId# ) AND a.REGIST_SE_CODE in ('REGC05', 'REGC06') UNION ALL SELECT a.BBS_ID, '' as USER_NM FROM COMTNBBSUSE a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNBBSMASTER b ON a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON c.CODE = a.REGIST_SE_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER g ON e.EMPLYR_ID = g.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER h ON f.EMPLYR_ID = h.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.BBS_ID IN ( SELECT BBS_ID FROM COMTNBBSUSE WHERE TRGET_ID = #trgetId# AND USE_AT ='Y' ) AND a.REGIST_SE_CODE in ('REGC05', 'REGC06') AND ( (a.BBS_ID, e.EMPLYR_ID) not in (SELECT BBS_ID, TRGET_ID FROM COMTNBBSUSE) OR (a.BBS_ID, f.EMPLYR_ID) not in (SELECT BBS_ID, TRGET_ID FROM COMTNBBSUSE) ) ) tt
